definitions.definition: ( dated ) Unable to speak ; lacking power of speech ( kept in "deaf, dumb, and blind" ).
examples: His younger brother was born dumb , and communicated with sign language.

definitions.definition: ( archaic ) Not talkative ; taciturn or unwilling to speak.
( dated ) Having no input or voice in running things.
( dated , of things, actions, etc. ) Unaccompanied by words or speech, silent , wordless .
( dated ) Not producing any sound , silent .
( informal , derogatory , especially of a person ) Stupid .
examples: You are so dumb ! You don't even know how to make toast!

definitions.definition: ( figuratively ) Pointless , foolish , lacking intellectual content or value.
examples: This is dumb ! We're driving in circles! We should have asked for directions an hour ago!
Brendan had the dumb job of moving boxes from one conveyor belt to another.

definitions.definition: Lacking some functionality or property ordinarily characteristic of its kind.
( of technology ) Not equipped with intelligent behavior or processing capabilities of its own.
( obsolete , rare ) Lacking brightness or clearness as a colour ; dim , dull .

definitions.definition: An intensifier expressing contempt ; damn , damned .

main_definition: ( African-American Vernacular , dated ) An intensifier expressing contempt ; damn , damned .
